SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LPROD L INNER JOIN BUYER B ON(L.LPROD_GU = B.BUYER_LGU) WHERE 1 = 1
AND (L.LPROD_GU LIKE '%'||#{keyWord}||'%' OR L.LPROD_NM LIKE '%'||#{keyWord}||'%' OR B.BUYER_ID LIKE '%'||#{keyWord}||'%' OR B.BUYER_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyWord}||'%')

SELECT (SELECT L.LPROD_NM FROM LPROD L WHERE L.LPROD_GU = B.BUYER_LGU) LPROD_NM , B.BUYER_ID , B.BUYER_NAME , B.BUYER_LGU , B.BUYER_BANK , B.BUYER_BANKNO , B.BUYER_BANKNAME , B.BUYER_ZIP , B.BUYER_ADD1 , B.BUYER_ADD2 , B.BUYER_COMTEL , B.BUYER_FAX , B.BUYER_MAIL , B.BUYER_CHARGER , B.BUYER_TELEXT , B.BUYER_IMG FROM BUYER B WHERE B.BUYER_ID = #{buyerId}
SELECT MEMBERID,PASSWORD,NAME,EMAIL,REGDATE,INTRODUCTION,MEMBER_SERT_PIC FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBERID = #{memberid} AND PASSWORD = PKG_CRYPTO.ENCRYPT(#{password})
SELECT T.PROD_NAME, T.MONEY FROM ( SELECT P.PROD_NAME, SUM(P.PROD_SALE * C.CART_QTY) MONEY FROM PROD P, CART C WHERE P.PROD_ID = C.CART_PROD GROUP BY P.PROD_NAME ) T WHERE T.MONEY >= 10000000
